content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[sample]
WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'raw/sample/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [chicago],
	FILE_FORMAT = [chicago]
)
as
SELECT top 100
    datatype,
	datasubtype
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK     'https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/citydatacontainer/Safety/Release/city=Chicago/',
        FORMAT = 'parquet'
    ) AS [result]
